resources.string: Please specify an email address, a phone number, or both.

Please provide an email address or phone number, or both.
If the alarm is triggered, an email or text message will be sent to the email address or phone number provided.
Also, please provide a PIN, which you will need to enter to disarm the alarm.
Be sure to press "Save" when done.
Please specify a PIN that is at least 4 digits long.
